sentences.en: Base to Ranger One , we've got a makeuP CheCk in the dining room.
sentences.cn: 呼叫巡警, 我们看见有人在起居室化妆.

sentences.en: Davidson says he's the lowest man on the Ranger totem pole.
sentences.cn: 大卫森说他是骑警阶层最低的.

sentences.en: Excusez - moi de vous d é ranger . Ce meuble est tr è s lourd. Pouvez - vous m'aider?
sentences.cn: 对不起打扰您了, 这家具很重,您能帮我一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: In the Ranger area highly chloritic rocks were believed to be altered dolerites.
sentences.cn: 兰杰地区的强烈绿泥石化岩石据信可能是蚀变粒玄岩.

sentences.en: Prerequisite: Ranger, Hunter's Quarry class feature, Mark of Finding feat.
sentences.cn: 前提: 巡林客, 猎手标的职业特性, 探索龙纹专长.

sentences.en: Q: What's the difference between an Orc Pawn and a Ranger?
sentences.cn: 问: 兽人爪牙和游侠有什么区别?

sentences.en: Ranger : Surveil - Range lowered to 35 meters from 50 meters.
sentences.cn: Ranger:Surveil,有效距离从50公尺降低至35公尺.

sentences.en: Ranger 6 arced on a graceful, curving course towards the moon.
sentences.cn: (月球探测卫星)徘徊者6号沿着一条优美的曲线循弧线飞向月球.

sentences.en: The choice is yours: Warrior, Ranger , Monk , Elementalist, Mesmer, or Necromancer.
sentences.cn: 您的选择有: 战士 、 射手 、 僧侣 、 元素使、催眠师和死灵法师.

sentences.en: The Hunter you could liken to the prototypical Ranger.
sentences.cn: 你们可以把猎人看成游侠.

sentences.en: The ranger approached silently , drawing closer to the one he came seeking.
sentences.cn: 那武道家似乎正在俯览着眼前的大地.

sentences.en: The Ranger deals 5 times his or her level damage.
sentences.cn: 造成5倍于英雄等级的伤害.

sentences.en: The ranger's footsteps made no sound as he climbed toward the summit.
sentences.cn: 游侠悄无声息的向顶峰攀爬着.

sentences.en: We were pretty much lost when we met the forest ranger.
sentences.cn: 在遇到护林员的时候我们几乎快要迷路了.

sentences.en: When one rope was cut , a Ranger would grab another and begin his climb again.
sentences.cn: 一条绳索被割断, 就抓住另一条继续攀登.

words.tran_cn: 平行，列为一行；延伸；漫游；射程达到
漫游；放牧；使并列；归类于；来回走动
突击队员；漫游者；骑警；别动队员

trans.tran_cn: 护林者，<美>突击队，（防守广大地域的）游击兵，骑兵巡逻队，游荡的人
